body.name: Dove VitaminCare+ Aluminum Free Deodorant Stick Coconut & Shea for 72H Odor Protection Breathable Deodorant for Women 2.6 oz
deliveryMessages: FREE delivery Tuesday, February 20 on orders shipped by Amazon over $35. Order within 2 hrs 15 mins
features: OUR NEXT GENERATION ALUMINUM FREE DEODORANT: Feel the confidence of 72h breathable deodorant for women without aluminum, parabens or baking soda. Superpowered with vitamins!
REVOLUTIONARY VITAMIN SCIENCE: Dove VitaminCare+ is enriched with skin-loving Vitamin B3 (yes, the famous Niacinamide!). Groundbreaking research has found that B3 helps skin’s natural odor defense.
HEALTHIER FEELING SKIN: Upgrade your underarm skincare with our powerful triple-action formula. It works to help repair the skin barrier, even skin tone and instantly moisturizes to soothe dryness.
LIGHTWEIGHT & BREATHABLE: Our invisible formula glides on clear without stickiness or heavy white marks. For breathable odor protection that leaves you feeling comfortable and #FreshFreshFresh.
IRRESISTIBLE FRAGRANCES: Feel confident with the Coconut & Shea fragrance. Milky, sweet, comforting and delicious. This creamy and indulgent scent is sure to be a favorite.
CERTIFIED CRUELTY-FREE & VEGAN: Globally, Dove deodorant does not test on animals and is certified cruelty-free by PETA.
body.description: Want an alu-free deodorant, but natural deodorant isn’t cutting it? Introducing new Dove VitaminCare+, our next generation of aluminum free deodorants for 72h of long-lasting, vitamin-enriched odor control. Our new vitamin-fortified formula helps skin’s natural odor defense whilst renewing skin to look and feel healthy again. All in a deodorant that’s free from aluminum! Why Vitamins in a Deodorant? Your skin contains natural odor fighting molecules called Anti-Microbial Peptides (AMPs). Recent research has discovered that Vitamin B3 (AKA Niacinamide) partners with these AMPs, helping skin naturally protect itself from odor. Inspired by this cutting-edge science, we have fortified our effective deodorizing agents with Vitamin B3 for an added layer of odor protection. Dove VitaminCare+ gives you 72h of odor control fortified with Vitamin B3! You may already use Niacinamide in your skincare routine, but did you know it also works on your underarm skin? Vitamin B3 (Niacinamide) doubles as a skincare powerhouse, deeply nourishing and renewing skin... Like a mini facial for your underarms! It works to help repair the skin barrier, even skin tone and moisturize skin to soothe dryness that may be caused by waxing, shaving or rubbing against clothes. Feel the freedom of a lightweight and breathable formula that glides on clear for ultimate comfort… Invisible odor control with no clumps and no heavy white marks. Dove VitaminCare+ is available in six delicious and indulgent scents, bursting full of freshness. Created to be true to the natural scent of the ingredient and smell fresh as you apply, these scents will keep giving throughout the day, without being overpowering. Discover a new signature scent of feel-good freshness in your deo for the right start to your day. Supplement your underarms with Dove VitaminCare+ Coconut & Shea deodorant for women today and experience the vitamin difference yourself! How will you feel when your deodorant is #SuperpoweredWithVitamins? Dove is certified cruelty-free by PETA because we believe that real beauty is cruelty-free. We’re on a mission to help women raise their self-esteem – because we believe beauty should be a source of confidence, not anxiety. Dove antiperspirants and deodorants deliver effective underarm protection and are kind to skin, so women can be free of underarm inhibitions and live beautifully unselfconsciously. Explore our wide range of Dove Deodorant products available including dry spray deodorant, antiperspirant for sweat and deodorant without aluminum. Find the best deodorant for your skin care routine.

Triple action formula with Vitamin B3 Deodorizes, Helps repair skin barrier & Evens tone 72h odor protection Aluminum & paraben free Lightweight & Breathable Invisible formula glides on skin without stickiness or heavy white marks Cruelty free & vegan Globally, Dove deodorant does not test on animals and is certified cruelty-free by PETA

Dove VitaminCare+ Raspberry & Rose Deodorant Stick, 2.6 oz Dove VitaminCare+ Lavender & Chamomile Deodorant Stick, 2.6 oz Dove VitaminCare+ Cucumber & Melon Deodorant Stick, 2.6 oz Experience ultimate freshness with Raspberry & Rose- Fun, fresh, fruity and floral, this scent complements your spirit and layers well with almost any perfume. Feel your most confident self with Coconut & Shea. Milky, sweet, comforting and delicious. This creamy and indulgent scent is one of our favorites. Feel truly refreshed with Cucumber & Melon. A fresh, watery & tropical fragrance that will make you feel and smell fresh in an instant. One for the gym bag.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 26, 2024
reviews.reviewText: This is exactly what I’ve been looking for. I hope they don’t discontinue.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 24, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars smells so good and goes on smooth!
reviews.reviewText: This smells amazing! I generally use “clinical strength” deodorant, but that can be pricey and include unsafe ingredients. So, while I was searching for alternatives, I came across this deodorant and decided to give it a try. It smells great and leaves me smelling great (which is a MIRACLE LOL). It goes on SO smooth—like butter. It’s clear, so I don’t notice any marks or stains from the deodorant on my clothing. I will continue to use it and see how it holds up in the summer and over the next few months.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 29, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 3.0 out of 5 stars NOT A NICE SCENT
reviews.reviewText: Does not hold off odor. The scent is not appealing. Would not purchase again.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 8, 2024
reviews.reviewText: Love that this deodorant is made with great ingredients that are supposed to be good for your skin. The smell is delicious and lasts very long as well. I have tried my fair share of aluminum free deodorants that don't work and instead leave me feeling moist with sweat throughout the day, but that is not the case with this one. Very comprable to other Dove aluminum deodorants but is instead a lot better for your skin.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 12, 2024
reviews.reviewText: I have been on the hunt for an aluminum free deodorant and I came across this. I like it, I'm not a huge fragrance person but it does smell nice. I am pretty fair skinned and my skin is sensitive, this has not given me a rash or any irritation.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 31, 2023
reviews.reviewText: I will 100% say that I have refused to jump to the aluminum free deodorant side because I was worried about effectiveness.I was extremely skeptical with this deodorant and even carried my old one around with me because I did not trust it.Well my old deodorant is now in the trash and I am in love with this deodorant. It’s so unbelievably smooth to apply, and doesn’t get “caught” on my armpits. It smells lovely, and is not over powering.Honestly if I keep raving about this I’ll sound like a broken record. Coming from a staunch avoider, to a believer I highly recommend this deodorant.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 18, 2024
reviews.reviewText: This deodorant has a great scent. No irritation. Lasts a full day. Not sure about 72 hrs but it seems plausible.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 31, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 2.0 out of 5 stars Not for me
reviews.reviewText: Smelled good but personally made me feel sticky very quickly after applying
